channel.title: Looking for staff and co-coder
channel.description: This is my first time as a RSPS host but i need help coding and everything im open for staff and admins Co-Coder will get owner of course tho! PM me or leave a comment here

item.title: Looking for staff and co-coder
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Deathdomain, post:7, topic:482511”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=600747.msg4223934#msg4223934 date=1360913334]

This is my first time as a RSPS host but i need help coding and everything
im open for staff and admins
Co-Coder will get owner of course tho!
PM me or leave a comment here

Aside from being a host. What are YOU going to do.
[/quote]

coding alot, im almost half done with the source as we speak. havent found anyone yet to help co-code it… wow some people these days.[/quote]
Yeah. People these days. They suck. Why can’t they make good posts that captivates the reader and makes them want to join their dev team. scoffs

Read full topic
